description: Grafana dashboard for viewing Nextcloud audit logs with data collected by Loki/Promtail

panels.description: this can also mean successful logins

targets.expr: sum by(remoteAddr) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/log.*`  message !~ `.*.(S|s)uccessful.*`  __error__=""[$__range]))

panels.title: login attempts by unique remote IP

panels.description: Anonymous users are scripts or talk logins

targets.expr: count by(user) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json message="message", remoteAddr="remoteAddr", time="time", userAgent="userAgent", user="user", url="url" | message!~".*(S|s)uccessful.*"| __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: login attempts by user

panels.description: This can also mean successful logins. If this value increases rapidly, it may be a DDOS attack.

targets.expr: sum by(remoteAddr) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/log.*`  message !~ `.*.(S|s)uccessful.*`  __error__=""[$__range]))

panels.title: login attempts by unique remote IP

panels.description: Attempted logins with invalid username or unsuccessful logins with known usernames. If a certain username appears more often than 1, it may be that the username was read out of eher via a databreach.

targets.expr: count by(user)(sum by(user,reqId)(count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/login` | pattern `<_>Login attempt: \"<userLogin>\"` |  label_format user=userLogin| __error__=""[$__range])) == 1)

panels.title: login attempts with unknown user

defaults.noValue: no user logins found within the the timerange

targets.expr: {job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/log.*` | pattern `<_>Login attempt: \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>Login successful: \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>Failed two factor attempt by user <userName> `| pattern `<_>Successful two factor attempt by user <userName> ` | __error__=""

defaults.noValue: no file changes by users found within the the timerange

targets.expr: {job="$jobname", filename="$filename"}| json | url=~"/remote.php/dav/.*" method!~"REPORT" method!~"PROPFIND" method!~"OPTIONS"  | pattern `<_>File<_> \"/<_>/<fileName>\"` | __error__=""

panels.description: Files deleted from the trash bin. These are irretrievably deleted.

targets.expr: count by (message) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~"/remote.php/dav/trashbin/.*" method="DELETE" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Files deleted from trash

panels.description: If a lot of files were deleted at once, you should take a closer look.

targets.expr: count by (message) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~"/remote.php/dav/.*" url!~"/remote.php/dav/.*./trash" method="DELETE" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Files deleted

panels.description: If a lot of files were changed at once, you should take a closer look.

targets.expr: count by (reqId) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~"/apps/text/session/sync" method="POST" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Files updated

panels.description: Number of files created. If this number increases very much, there may be a problem.

targets.expr: count by (message) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | message=~`File created.*` | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Files created

panels.description: Number of downloads. These do not have to be different files.

targets.expr: count by (message) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~".*.download.*"  | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: File downloads

panels.description: Number of files created. If this number increases very much, there may be a problem.

targets.expr: count by (message) (count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | message=~`File created.*`| __error__="" [$__range]))

panels.title: Files created

panels.description: User changes, e.g. creation, deletion, deactivation, password change, etc.

result.text: User has been given admin rights

defaults.noValue: no user changes found within the the timerange

targets.expr: {job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json  | url=~`/ocs/v2.php/cloud/users.*` | pattern `<_>User created: \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>User deleted: \"<userName>\"`| pattern `<_>Password of user \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>Email<_>user <userName>"` | pattern `<_>User \"<userName>\" added` | pattern `<_>User \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>User enabled: \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>User disabled: \"<userName>\"`| __error__=""

panels.title: Changes

defaults.noValue: no anonymous accesses found within the the timerange

targets.expr: {job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | user=`--` | message=~"The shared.*" | pattern `<_>The shared folder with the token \"<accesstoken>\" by \"<sharedby>\"` | pattern `<_>The shared file with the token \"<accesstoken>\" by \"<sharedby>\"`

count by(time)(count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | user=`--` message=~"The shared.*" | pattern `<_>The shared folder with the token \"<accesstoken>\" by \"<sharedby>\"` | pattern `<_>The shared file with the token \"<accesstoken>\" by \"<sharedby>\"` | __error__="" [$__interval]))

count by(remoteAddr)(count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | user=`--` message=~"The shared.*" | pattern `<_>The shared folder with the token \"<accesstoken>\" by \"<sharedby>\"` | pattern `<_>The shared file with the token \"<accesstoken>\" by \"<sharedby>\"` | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Anonymous accesses by unique remote IPs

panels.description: See permission changes panel below to find out if the full write permission has been revised again.

targets.expr: sum by(shareID)(count_over_time({job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/ocs/v2.php/apps/files_sharing/api/v1/shares/.*` message!~`The password.*` | pattern `<_>The permissions of the shared folder \"/<sharedFileOrFolder>\"<_>\"<shareID>\"<_>\"<changedPermissionID>\"` | changedPermissionID=`31` | __error__="" [$__interval]))

panels.title: Possible folder shares with full write permission

panels.description: Anonymous file operations via share link. Accesses without user login.

defaults.noValue: no anonymous file operations found within the the timerange

targets.expr: {job="$jobname", filename="$filename"}| json  | user=`--` url!=`--` message!~`Login.*` | pattern `<_>File <_> \"/<_>/<fileName>\"` | pattern `<_>Preview <_> \"/<_>/<fileName>\"`| __error__=""

panels.title: Anonymous file operations via sharelink

panels.description:
#### Files
| Share permissions | Code |
| ------------------| ---|
| Read-only |17 |
| Allow editing | 19 |
#### Folders
| Share permissions | Code |
| ------------------| ---|
| Write Protected |17 |
|Allow upload and editing | 31 |
|Allow upload and editing (no upload) | 27 |
|Allow upload and editing (no upload, no editing) |25 |

defaults.noValue: no permission changes on shared folders found within the the timerange

targets.expr: {job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/ocs/v2.php/apps/files_sharing/api/v1/shares/.*` message!~`The password.*`| pattern `<_>The permissions of the shared folder \"/<sharedFileOrFolder>\"<_>\"<shareID>\"<_>\"<changedPermissionID>\"` | pattern `<_>The permissions of the shared file \"/<sharedFileOrFolder>\"<_>\"<shareID>\"<_>\"<changedPermissionID>\"` | __error__=""

panels.title: Permission changes on shared folders or files

panels.description: General nextcloud audit logs with references to events

targets.expr: {job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | message=~"Login successful.*" | line_format "  IP {{.remoteAddr}}  {{.user}}  {{.message }}  {{.userAgent}} {{.method}} {{.url }} {{.userAgent}}"

{job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/log.*`  message !~ `.*.(S|s)uccessful.*` | pattern `<_>. \"<wrongUser>\"` | line_format "  IP {{.remoteAddr}}  {{.wrongUser}}  {{.message }}  {{.userAgent}} {{.method}} {{.url }} {{.userAgent}}"

{job="$jobname", filename="$filename"}| json | url=~"/remote.php/dav/.*" method!~"REPORT" method!~"PROPFIND" method!~"OPTIONS"  | pattern `<_>File<_> \"/<_>/<fileName>\"` | line_format "  IP {{.remoteAddr}}  {{.user}}  {{.message }}  {{.userAgent}} {{.method}} {{.url }} {{.userAgent}}"

{job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json  | url=~`/ocs/v2.php/cloud/users.*` | pattern `<_>User created: \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>User deleted: \"<userName>\"`| pattern `<_>Password of user \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>Email<_>user <userName>"` | pattern `<_>User \"<userName>\" added` | pattern `<_>User \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>User enabled: \"<userName>\"` | pattern `<_>User disabled: \"<userName>\"`| line_format "  IP {{.remoteAddr}}  {{.userName}}  {{.message }}  {{.userAgent}} {{.method}} {{.url }} {{.userAgent}}"

{job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | user=`--` | message=~"The shared.*" | pattern `<_>The shared folder with the token \"<accesstoken>\" by \"<sharedby>\"` | pattern `<_>The shared file with the token \"<accesstoken>\" by \"<sharedby>\"` | line_format "  IP {{.remoteAddr}}  anonymous  {{.message }}  {{.userAgent}} {{.method}} {{.url }} {{.userAgent}}"

{job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/ocs/v2.php/apps/files_sharing/api/v1/shares/.*` | message!~`The password.*`| pattern `<_>The permissions of the shared folder \"/<sharedFileOrFolder>\"<_>\"<shareID>\"<_>\"<changedPermissionID>\"` | pattern `<_>The permissions of the shared file \"/<sharedFileOrFolder>\"<_>\"<shareID>\"<_>\"<changedPermissionID>\"` | changedPermissionID=~`(19|25|31)`| line_format "  IP {{.remoteAddr}}  {{.userName}}  {{.message }}  {{.userAgent}} {{.method}} {{.url }} {{.userAgent}}"

{job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | url=~`/ocs/v2.php/apps/files_sharing/api/v1/shares/.*` | message!~`The password.*`| pattern `<_>The permissions of the shared folder \"/<sharedFileOrFolder>\"<_>\"<shareID>\"<_>\"<changedPermissionID>\"` | pattern `<_>The permissions of the shared file \"/<sharedFileOrFolder>\"<_>\"<shareID>\"<_>\"<changedPermissionID>\"` | changedPermissionID!~`(19|25|31)`| line_format "  IP {{.remoteAddr}}  {{.userName}}  {{.message }}  {{.userAgent}} {{.method}} {{.url }} {{.userAgent}}"
{job="$jobname", filename="$filename"} | json | message=~"Login successful.*" | line_format "  IP {{.remoteAddr}}  {{.user}}  {{.message }}  {{.userAgent}} {{.method}} {{.url }} {{.userAgent}}"

panels.title: logfile

title: Nextcloud Audit Logs
